Merge Diamonds: Treasure!

April 13, 2025 Tags: 1 Player, 2048, 2D, Android, Ball, Brain, Game, Logic
Your task is to connect diamonds until you get the biggest one. Compete with friends and colleagues! In the game you have a game zone where diamonds fall and connect if they have the same color! Connect as many diamonds as possible to get the biggest one, collect points! Become the first on the leaderboard! The game has relaxing gameplay and beautiful graphics, play and relax!
